name: Hab-ATTACK
description:
Hab-ATTACK is an adorable dash-don’t-die platformer. Clean up your dirty planet & dash through toxic monsters!

You play as a LEAF GRL working to rid her world of pollutant monsters, yick! Protect your world alone or with a friend! Pick up sunlight orbs and dash into enemies before you run out of power! Can you survive the onslaught of baddies? SAVE THE PLANET and KICK SOME POLLUTANT BUTT!

ALSO, you can choose to play against a friend in a head-to-head fight to the death! Who will be the best leaf on the block?

Features:
  • Solo, Co-op, or Versus game modes for up to 2 players on gamepads and/or keyboard
  • Ultra juicy gameplay inspired by Towerfall and Downwell
  • Adorable art inspired by Rugrats
  • Bumpin tunes to smash baddies to
  • All sound effects made by our mouths PEW PEW PEW
  • Eco-friendly development: all profits will be spent on plants and salad
